Texts.Chs: 我发现自己身处一座科学发展部控制的猿族人陈镇。但是，哦，控制是一个如此丑陋的词，不是吗？这里的猿人都是如此的礼貌和友好。当我经过时，他们鞠躬屈膝，我的科学发展部随从只是偶尔会把他们打回去！
Texts.Eng: I find myself in a Miniknog-controlled Apex town. But oh, control is such an ugly word, isn't it? The Apex here are all so polite, and friendly. They bow and grovel as I pass, my Miniknog entourage only occasionally having to knock them back!

Texts.Chs: 这一切都很令人兴奋。大猿的观众！绿手指告诉我，他听说了我的丰功伟绩，想向我请教一下。我的意思是，天哪，我听说过大猿采集猿人大脑的谣言，但我不认为这意味着什么。
Texts.Eng: It's all very exciting. An audience with Big Ape! Greenfinger told me he's heard about my exploits, and would like to pick my brain. I mean gosh, I've heard rumours about Big Ape picking peoples' brains, but I don't think it means that this time.
